revised_title: The Hon. Daines Barrington, F. R. S. and Gilbert White's Naturalist Journals
tldr: The article discusses the influence of the Hon. Daines Barrington, F. R. S. on Gilbert White's naturalist journals. Barrington introduced White to the methodical and standardized way of keeping records, which transformed White into a dedicated scientific observer and record-keeper. The article also highlights the annotations and commentary by Barrington on White's journals, focusing on their shared interest in ornithology and the development of scientific understanding in the 18th century.
